items.title: “The Syria game will be demanding but we'll give it our all. It won't be an easy task. We need to play as a team and fight together. Our tactics in this tournament are built on teamwork”
"Our resources have been slashed along with funding for human rights organisations, including at the grassroots level around the world,"
"Essential work has had to be cut, including on Colombia, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Myanmar, Tunisia and other countries at a time when the needs are rising,"
"With the World Cup draw done, we'll be more specific in simulating things and reinforcing the team looking toward the finals while aiming for the win,"

– Etter nok et sterkt idrettsår skal det bli stas å hylle våre ypperste utøvere igjen. Det å lede gallaen med Mia for andre gang blir som å møte Italia i fotball – mye nerver i forkant, men så viser det seg å være lekende lett likevel,
“I think that the Trump administration emboldens and strengthens authoritarian regimes around the world,”
“It seems that at VW, the willingness to change declines the tougher the challenges become,”
“Cada vez hay más adolescentes a bordo y queríamos evolucionar con ellos”
«Il progetto #VareseDoYouBike è nato per collegare le tante piccole iniziative legate al cicloturismo, partendo dagli itinerari»
